Summary: Pretty close to Disney. Uber was $8 morning, $16 evening. Limited breakfast (Eggos. toast, cereal). No hot foods. Clean, very large room - three beds. Good for the money. Bunk beds are cool and would be good for families with kids.
Manager Response: Hi khinds,   Thank you so much for your kind words. I‚Äôm so pleased that you found us a clean and pleasant place to stay and that our location and breakfast were to your liking. We take real pride in this hotel and in serving guests like you, and I‚Äôm extremely happy that you had such a pleasant stay. We look forward to having you with us again soon.

Summary: I loved the King/Twin bunk beds - very nice use of space! Comfy beds/pillows, window in bath room for fresh air, easy parking. We walked to Downtown Disney - that was long but doable. It's pretty quiet there, besides hearing other room doors slam - so if you are reading this, be a nice neighbor and remember to gently shut your doors anywhere you go, not just here. Be nice.
Manager Response: Hi Daydreem50166412490,   Thank you for giving us the opportunity to recognize our staff for their exemplary work in providing a clean and comfortable experience for our valued guests. Our ultimate ambition is to provide a five-star experience, and we are thrilled to learn that we have succeeded. I am glad that we were able to meet your expectations of service and accommodations and we're all looking forward to your next visit!

Summary: The beds were horrible I could not sleep I came here to relax because I‚Äôm having surgery in a week they gave me a room with a horrible broken bed it had a big giant dip in it I could not sleep when I told the manager about it he didn‚Äôt care and didn‚Äôt wanna do anything about it not even change my room walking on the floor from the bed to the toilet twice at night my feet were totally black I had just had a pedicure that day now my feet are black on the bottom very unclean not friendly and I wouldn‚Äôt advise anyone to stay here
Manager Response: Dear Sonia,  We are sorry to hear that several things during your stay did not meet your expectations. Please accept my sincere apologies for the state of your guest room and overall experience. This is a very uncommon scenario, and we again apologize for any inconvenience it caused you. I will be sure to investigate the matter and make sure it does not happen again.  Again, please accept my sincere apologies for your difficulties during your stay with us.  Regards, Magnolia Tree Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Clean and functional. Perfect for practical people.
Summary: Family suite room layout wasn't as separated as shown in the photos but the beds were the same: 1 king, and a queen/twin bunk. More than enough space for 2 adults and 3 kids.  When I say practical, here's what I mean: 1) large bottles of shampoo/soap - I don't like small Hilton/Marriott bottles that are just littering the planet with plastic waste  2) breakfast was just bagels/oatmeal/cereal with milk/coffee/OJ - it's no 5* hotel buffet, but let's be honest, this is all I need and I am happy not to pay twice the price for the fancier food 3) room was clean, neighborhood was safe, and front desk people were easy to work with. That's all I need.  Minor annoyance: the pre-check-in forms which they said is handled by Booking.com and doesn't get relayed to them.  Word of advice for
Manager Response: Dear Slipaway,  We are always pleased to receive feedback from our guests about their stays with us, and we are delighted with your PERFECT score. It makes us so happy to know that you loved our well-maintained and clean hotel during your stay. We are happy to see that you appreciated our complimentary breakfast and friendly staff.  We look forward to hosting you again soon for another enriching stay on your next trip to Anaheim.  Thank you, Magnolia Tree Hotel Management  P.S. For amazing offers and the best prices on our accommodations, book directly on our website: magnoliatreehotel.com.

Summary: I had a very nice stay of 5 days at the Magnolia Tree in Anaheim.  When I arrived around midnight on the first night I found my reservation had been canceled by Booking dot com without my knowledge. The hotel was gracious to give me a larger room for the mistake even though it was not their fault.  Comfortable room, not fancy but great for the price and location
Manager Response: Dear Kccrum,  Thank you so much for giving us a valuable rating for your stay with us in Anaheim. It‚Äôs fantastic to learn that you had an easy check-in process and found our room to be clean and spacious. Thank you for recognizing our affordable rates and the value our hotel provides. We are happy you enjoyed our convenient location.  We always want our guests to have a memorable stay with us, so we hope to see you again soon and earn a perfect score.  Thank You, Magnolia Tree Hotel Management  P.S. Be sure to book directly at magnoliatreehotel.com to find the lowest available rates for our property.

Summary: The staff was incredibly friendly. The room was clean and comfortable. Breakfast was simple, but good. While it may not have all of the amenities of the larger hotels, the location can‚Äôt be beat! I would stay here again anytime!
Manager Response: Dear Lianna,  Thank you so much for leaving a Perfect Score review for your stay at Magnolia Tree Hotel. Our friendly and supportive staff works hard to keep the guest rooms clean, convenient, and comfortable. We are happy you enjoyed our convenient location and spotless rooms. We are happy to see that you appreciated our complimentary breakfast.  We can't wait to have you back for another pleasant stay with us on your next visit to Anaheim.  Thank You, Magnolia Tree Hotel Management  P.S. For amazing offers and the best prices on our accommodations, book directly on our website: magnoliatreehotel.com.

Summary: I‚Äôm used to hotels not living up to what the Internet says, but this place did not disappoint. Staff was pleasant. Everything was clean and fresh. The towels weren‚Äôt ‚Äúoh so fluffy,‚Äù but they got the job done. The bedding WAS nice. I would stay here again whether for an event at the convention center (like this time; very walkable) or for Disney, etc.
Manager Response: Dear Paul,  Thank you so much for leaving a Perfect Score review for your stay at Magnolia Tree Hotel.  We are so honored by the praise you provided for our hospitality, service, and maintenance. Thank you so much for appreciating our hardworking staff and convenient location. Our staff takes full responsibility to provide guests with a clean and comfortable stay. It's also an honor for us to learn that you had a good night's sleep on our comfortable beds.  We can't wait to have you back for another pleasant stay with us on your next visit to our area. Until then, take care!  Thank You, Magnolia Tree Hotel Management  P.S. Don't forget to book directly on magnoliatreehotel.com to get the best deals and discounts.

Summary: Our experience here was good!  Best part was the sleeping arrangement‚Äîbunk bed for kid. Fairly clean. Lots of USB‚Äôs, app tv, which was convenient for entertaining kid. Nights were quiet and bed was comfortable.  Cons: no counter space in bathroom. Bathroom is an odd layout. Not many convenient racks for towels either. Bathroom could‚Äôve been cleaner.  If you don‚Äôt mind walking 1.5 miles after a long day at Disney, location is fine. We decided to drive.
Manager Response: Dear Tina,  YOU MADE OUR DAY! Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a PERFECT 5-STAR REVIEW of your recent stay at Magnolia Tree Hotel.  Comfort and convenience are our best attributes.  Glad to see that your experience highlighted this. It's great to hear that you found our place quiet and peaceful during your stay. It is awesome to learn that you loved our comfortable beds and the convenient location.  We look forward to hosting you again soon for another enriching stay on your next trip to Anaheim.  Thank You, Magnolia Tree Hotel Management  P.S. Always remember to book your stay directly at magnoliatreehotel.com where you will find the lowest rates anywhere online.

Summary: A nice ideal, no frills base for my holiday.  The room was good, beds very comfy after a long day of activities, and the breakfast was a nice extra.  I wasn‚Äôt looking for more, so more than happy and would come back.
Manager Response: Dear Wendy,  Thank you so much for leaving a Perfect Score review for your stay at Magnolia Tree Hotel.  We are so glad you enjoyed our delicious complimentary breakfast, clean rooms, and comfortable beds. Our staff takes pride in working hard to provide clean rooms, greet guests, and ensure a fantastic stay, and your review speaks for itself--we are honored.  Thank you for choosing to stay with us, we are eagerly waiting to welcome you back soon.  Best Regards, Magnolia Tree Hotel Management  P.S. Book your stay directly on MagnoliaTreeHotel.com, where you will get exciting offers and great discounts!

Summary: This hotel was much better than I had expected. The room was clean and large. I was alone but it could easily accommodate multiple people with its king sized bed and a bunk bed above. There are a lot of restaurants around and it is not too far to walk to Disneyland. I would stay here again if I had the opportunity.
Room tip: This hotel is on a busy street I‚Äôm a city, so you will most likely hear traffic noises. I was in...
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide us with your valuable feedback. It is honorable to learn how you are impressed by our housekeeping staff and their dedicated service. Thanks for noting our great location--it is definitely something that sets our hotel apart from the competition.   Once again, we genuinely appreciate your feedback, and we hope to host you again very soon!  Best Regards, Magnolia Tree Hotel Management  P.S. Always remember to book your stay directly on our official website Magnoliatreehotel.com, you will get the lowest possible rates anywhere online!

Summary: We stayed one night in a family suite. It was perfect for sleep after a full day at the park.  It was close, the beds were comfy, plenty of room for a 16  and 8 year old and for two adults and it was really clean.  Thank you!
Manager Response: Hi Dickson,  WOW! Thank you for giving us a PERFECT RATING! It feels great to know that you enjoyed our modern and comfy hotel. I am so happy you liked the clean room and good vibes. Our staff works tirelessly to keep our hotel neat and clean. Thanks for the appreciation.  We would love to welcome you and your family back at the Magnolia Tree Hotel!  Best Regards, Magnolia Tree Hotel Management  P.S. Book your stay directly on our official website: MagnoliaTreeHotel.com and get excellent deals and discounts!

Summary: Everything was great very clean rooms, SUPER comfortable beds and cozy hotel room. Spacious and enough space for our family of 5. Good hotel parking very close to your room. Hotel is located within 25 mins walking distance to Disney. We will definitely stay here again no complaints at all!!
Manager Response: Dear Jessica,  Thank you for the PERFECT SCORE RATING of your stay with us during your trip to Disneyland. We are glad that you had a great time staying here at our spotless, comfortable, and welcoming hotel. We are pleased to learn that you loved our hotel rooms and other amenities we offer.  Thanks so much for your stellar recommendation! We look forward to hosting you again soon for another enriching stay on your next trip to Anaheim.  Best Regards, Magnolia Tree Hotel Management  P.S. Book your stay directly on our official website: MagnoliaTreeHotel.com and get excellent deals and discounts!

Summary Heading: I choose magnolia tree hotel over any of the near by choices when in Anaheim.
Summary: The staff is always really nice, and the rooms are spacious and very clean with a nice modern feel. I definitely always choose the magnolia tree hotel. Its a great value for the price. Thanks again for the stay! Will be back and will recommend. Oh and the beds are very comfy!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Paige,  WOW! We are so excited to hear from you and to receive a coveted 5-star review! It made my day to hear that you had a fantastic experience with us and that you loved our comfortable beds, and super location. We love our guests enjoying our provided amenities to the fullest. And we would love to host you again for your next trip to Anaheim.  Thanks for your continued patronage.   Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Management  P.S. Book your stay directly on MagnoliaTreeHotel.com instead of Online Travel Agents, where you will get exciting offers and great discounts!

Summary: If you like floors that leave dirt on your feet, rank unwashed sheets, lots of noise, and a front desk person who hates other people including you and isn‚Äôt on site for all issues, then this place is for you!
Manager Response: Dear Johnny:  It is apparent from your review that you did not really enjoy your experience at The Magnolia Tree Hotel. It is disappointing to read that we failed to meet your desired expectations. I will certainly place this feedback in front of the respective team managers and make sure this never repeats again. We are sorry for all our shortcomings.  Thank you for staying with us!  Sincerely, The Magnolia Tree Hotel Management

Summary: Hotel room is great, the beds are wide so sharing isn‚Äôt no issue. You have a walk in hallway closet so you are able to storage your bags as well as hanging up clothes. Hotel is close to the park so you can either walk 30mins to the park or 10min drive to the park. Highly recommend staying here!
Manager Response: Hi SJA701,  Thank you for your spectacular response. We are glad that you liked the room and in-room amenities. Again, we are pleased to know that you found the location convenient. We will be happy to host you once more. We hope that your next trip is just around the corner!  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: I stayed at magnolia tree for a Disney trip this will be my 3rd stay here. It's decent. It's quite aways from the park. Breakfast is nothing special. It would be nice if they had curtains instead of shutters the rooms are really light. Also parking is free but we like to go to the park on our last day and they do not allow you to stay parked past check out.
Manager Response: Hi Journey687657,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review us. We are glad that you had a pleasant stay, We are offering a 'Lite Breakfast' for now but the plan is to expand and improve it. We have also noted your feedback regarding the curtains and will see what can be done about that. Depending on the vacancy, we are quite flexible with regards to parking past check-out. But we are sorry that we could not accommodate your request this time to make space for the upcoming visitors' vehicles. We hope that you will continue to visit us!  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: CLEAN ROOMS... FRIENDLY SERVICE. Convenient location... close to restaurants,  Target,  $7 lyft from DISNEYLAND. Decent breakfast but super clean eating area.  Only downfall to the room was no coffee pots in room.
Manager Response: Hi Geo408,  Thank you for your review. We are glad that you found the room immaculate and service amicable. Thank you for appreciating our location and cleanliness too. Also, we have noted your feedback regarding the coffee pots and will surely pass it to the management. We hope that you will continue to visit us!  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: They've done a good job of renovating this property. New fixtures in the bathroom. Comfortable bed. Wooden shutters on the windows. Good value for the money. Included breakfast is simple but filling. Service staff is very good
Manager Response: Hi efassett,  Thank you for your stellar rating and response. We are glad that you liked the recent renovations and amenities. Thank you for appreciating the overall value, staff service, and breakfast. We look forward to your next visit!  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: Stayed here for our most recent Disney trip. We go to Disney a few times a year and have tried a lot of the area hotels/motels. Magnolia Tree is great for what it is. For a low price, you‚Äôll get free parking, breakfast & WiFi, a clean (fairly) recently upgraded room, and convenient location on Harbor Blvd.
Manager Response: Hi  kk1232020,  Thank you for your stellar rating and response. We are glad that you loved the service rendered by us and liked the overall value. Thank you for your positive comments about the amenities too. We are pleased to know that you liked the location too. Certainly, it will be a pleasure to host you again in the future!  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: Stayed at the Magnolia Tree in May/19. Needed a decent room for a decent price in my favorite area of Anaheim - this little hotel was perfect. Super clean room, comfy bed, really nice staff and near the Target, various restaurants and a good shuttle to Disney. Love this place and would recommend to anyone needing a great place to sleep between Disney days
Manager Response: Hi pattiOlantern,  Thank you for your feedback. We are glad that you liked the room and found good value for money. Thank you for appreciating our cleanliness, amenities, location, and staff service. Nothing makes us happier than a guest leaving us with a first-rate experience. We thank you for your lovely recommendations and we hope that your next trip is just around the corner!  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: Overall we really enjoyed our stay. The beds are amazingly comfortable! The bathroom was nice and clean. A couple of minor negatives: the breakfast is very basic, the tub has glass doors which makes it difficult to bathe small children, the bright lights outside shine through the slats in the windows all night, and the parking was very very tight. There's an ART bus stop across the street if you're going to Disney, and it's a short walk to the Toy Story parking lot to catch the bus there. The staff was very friendly. The breakfast room has a few choices for cereal and bagels or toast, some packages of instant oatmeal, milk and Juice in the fridge, as well as yogurt. We were surprised that the bunk beds were as comfortable as the regular queen size beds. The kids really enjoyed
Manager Response: Hi rondah702,  Thank you for sharing your detailed experience with us. We are happy that you had a highly enjoyable stay coupled with comfortable beds, a clean bathroom, and friendly staff service. However, we are sorry about the minor inconveniences that you had to deal with. We have noted your suggestion regarding both the breakfast and glass doors and will definitely pass it to the management. But all in all, we are pleased that you were satisfied with the experience provided by us. We hope to see you again soon!  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Amazing holiday, a very helpful staff, very clean
Summary: I have stayed for 5 days there, and it was amazing, very clean, the room was spacious and the food is so good  i would like to specially thank Ammar the manager of this place and his wife, they have been of great help, whenever i faced any problem they were eager to help.
Manager Response: Hi maggiegendy,  Thank you for your amazing response. We are glad that you had a wonderful and immaculate stay coupled with good food and impressive service. On behalf of our team, we thank you for choosing us and we do hope to see you again in the future!  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: The Magnolia Tree Hotel in Anaheim is just down the street at the entrance to Disneyland.  The room was huge and the bed was one of the best in my many years of traveling.  We were happy to come back and got the same wonderful room The breakfast was skimpy, but fke the economical price,  any breakfast was not expected.
Manager Response: Hi Marcia,  Thank you for your spectacular response. We are glad that you found the room spacious and bed ideal for your needs. It is always a pleasure to hear from our regular customers. We have also noted your suggestion regarding breakfast and will try to improve that. We are eagerly looking forward to your next visit!  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: Our stay was okay. Our room was nice, but I didn‚Äôt like that I was up stairs with no elevator and my two kids were asleep in the stroller after a long day at Disneyland. I had to wake them up and carry my double stroller up the stairs. The walk was kinda long from Disneyland but not terrible.
Manager Response: Dear Nicolelee86,  Thank you for your valuable feedback. However, we are sorry for the room allocation. We apologize for the inconvenience you and your children had to face but we were unable to accommodate your request as we were running full. We will definitely keep in mind your convenience the next time and will strive hard to make your stay more successful. We hope to see you again soon!  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: Very clean room for an amazing price! Their king bed is very comfy and they have FREE parking! They also have free breakfast in the morning which was very nice. We will definitely be staying here again when we come back to Disney Land!
Manager Response: Dear kyleigh2019,  Thank you for your wonderful response. We are glad that you found good value for money and room immaculate. Again, we are happy to learn that you had a comfortable stay and loved the free parking and free breakfast facility. It was a pleasure hosting you! We are eagerly waiting to host you again in the future!  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: The room was nice, recently redone it seemed, bed and pillows were very comfy, but the tv didn‚Äôt have great channels and the mirror in the bathroom was super low and only showed the chest down and I‚Äôm not even tall. But overall great for what you‚Äôre paying and close to the park and convention center
Manager Response: Hi Heytheresierra,  Thank you so much for your honest review. We are glad that you liked the recently redone rooms and had a comfortable stay. However, we are sorry about the inconvenience you faced as a result of the tv channels and the bathroom mirror. We will surely pass your feedback regarding the channels to the management so that you can have better options the next time you want to entertain and relax. Again, we will also brood over your comment regarding the mirror height and see what can be done about that. But we are relieved to hear that you had a great stay overall and enjoyed the location and convenience. We look forward to the pleasure of serving you once more!  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: Beds are comfortable and I was able to sleep through the night. No charge for parking is always great. There‚Äôs free breakfast in the mornings. The staff is friendly and helpful. It‚Äôs the perfect stay for a night!
Manager Response: Hi there, It sounds as if our hotel was perfect for your needs, and we are delighted that you enjoyed your time with us so much. Thank you for your positive rating; we hope that you will have an opportunity to make a return visit very soon.    Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: The room was clean and spacious, and the bathroom was remodeled. The hotel had free parking but might had been overbooked because when we got back from Disneyland around 2am there was no parking. The staff was really friendly, however the other guests were not very considerate. I saw two vehicles parked in the middle of two parking spots. The other guests were extremely loud and was having an argument in the parking lot around 9pm. It was four groups in the family since they were yelling at each other across the parking lot and up and down the balcony. Then around 8am they were extremely loud and kids screaming. But overall the hotel was great.
Manager Response: Dear guest, It sounds as if our hotel was perfect for your needs, and we are delighted that you enjoyed your time with us so much. Thank you for your positive rating; we hope that you will have an opportunity to make a return visit very soon.    Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: My first impression of this hotel was when I called to let them know we‚Äôd be checking in late, they answered on the second ring. That already made me happy, I hate going through twenty different things just to talk to someone.   Check in was easy. The girl at the front desk was extremely nice and helpful. She was who I mainly dealt with. When I checked out there was a guy, he was also nice but I didn‚Äôt have any real interaction with him. The rooms were well kept and homey. The bathroom looked newly remodeled and was very clean. This was a relief to my boyfriend and I because we hate old/gross bathrooms at hotels, as I‚Äôm sure most people do ha.   The price you are paying for the location and the room, I think is well below what it‚Äôs actually worth. I was happy with my stay and
Manager Response: We are delighted to have provided you with suitable accommodation for your trip here. We appreciate your kind rating, and we hope to welcome you back again before long.  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Excellent Price, Nice Room, Close to Everything, I Slept Like a Baby
Summary: It was a last minute booking over Booking.com. At first I was not sure if I should book it because I‚Äôm looking for Hilton branded places to earn HH points but I‚Äôm glad I did. The room was clean. It‚Äôs surprisingly quiet although I‚Äôm at the 1st Level and across the main, busy street. Check in was prompt. I was given a parking pass. It‚Äôs walking distance to a lot of restaurants. The A/C worked great. I had a very good night‚Äôs sleep.
Manager Response: Dear mitcardinal,  Thank you so much for your thoughtful feedback! We are glad that you took the decision of staying with us and had a clean and peaceful stay. Again, we are pleased to know that you had a quick check-in and found the location and amenities just great. We look forward to welcoming you again!  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: A place to sleep for a few hours and nothing more
Summary: We visited the Magnolia Tree Hotel as part of a visit to Disneyland, like most do.  This should be the only reason whatsoever to stay here, and even then, you should only do so if you plan on staying all day from open to close and use the room as a place to sleep.    We checked in and found our room to be in a pretty poor state.  For starters, the carpets were so dirty we had to keep socks on that would quickly turn black from the carpets.  We all threw them away when we got home.  Of the two bedside lights, one was burned out and not working.  The bulbs in the bathroom were a rainbow of light colors from bright white to soft yellow in no particular order.  The walls were clearly very dirty and had not been washed in some time.  There was no cable TV, something I have never
Manager Response: Hi Nevergo33,  Thank you for sharing a review of your recent stay with us! On behalf of our entire team, we apologize for not being able to exceed your expectations. We are extremely sorry that you were not satisfied with our service and did not find the room to your liking. We will definitely ask our housekeeping crew to be more particular about ensuring cleanliness. Also, we have noted your feedback regarding the bedside lights and bulbs and will try our best to fix them! Again, we are sorry about the cable TV. We will see what can be done about that. However, we are glad that we could provide you with a good location, fast Wi-Fi and free parking. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using this review to ensure that we offer a better experience to our guests in the future. We would really appreciate a second chance to earn back your trust!  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: Free parking was nice. Before heading to Disneyland, they allowed us to park our car before check-in. Staff was friendly. Rooms were nothing special, but they were clean. Parking was tight. Breakfast only includes cereal and bagels. Price was reasonable. Denny‚Äôs next door, which was nice.  However, we won‚Äôt stay again as it is too far of a walk to Disneyland for us.
Manager Response: Dear mit591,  We thank you for your valuable feedback! We are extremely delighted to hear that you liked the free parking and staff service. Again, we appreciate your comment regarding the cleanliness and value offered. We specialise in providing our guests with a Lite Breakfast. However, the plan is to expand the selection and provide our guests with more varieties. We hope to make your next stay better!  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: I cannot say enough good things about this place. Clean rooms, kind and helpful staff, and very affordable. I will want to stay again and would recommend Magnolia Tree to others. I have stayed multiple places near a Disneyland, and, while this hotel is a little further away, it is a good one.
Manager Response: Dear Foxdoc,  We thank you for sparing a moment to write to us! We are glad that you just loved your stay and enjoyed every bit of it, right from the clean rooms to the amicable staff. We are sorry that the location proved to be a little far away but then we are still preferred for our location by the guests. We cannot thank you enough for your kind words and positivity. We would love to have you here with us once more!  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: Price was right for time at Disneyland with courteous staff and clean room. Just older hotel so nothing extra. It was also noisy with other customers coming thru. I felt safe by myself. I recommend for short stay
Manager Response: Dear bdunkin3,  Thank you for your amazing response! We are glad that you liked the value offered and found the staff service amicable. Again, we apologize for the inconvenience you faced as a result of the noise. We are sorry for that. We will see what can be done about that. We hope our next experience will be better! Hoping to see you here again and again!  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Great stay for a quick trip
Summary: Quick trip to Disney for a day. Can‚Äôt beat the price for two night and two queen beds. I would say the only downside was for our room with 4 girls total there was only a single mirror in the bathroom. This made for a difficult morning getting ready as there was one to share in the whole room. If they were able to add another in the room it would be perfect other than that it is perfect!
Manager Response: Dear 1995tara,  Thank you for your amazing response! We are glad that you loved your stay and enjoyed the location and value offered. However, we are sorry for the inconvenience you all had to face as a result of the mirror. We have noted your suggestion and will pass it to the management to do the needful. We hope you will keep coming to us! See you soon!  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: Freshly decorated, clean & modern. Comfortable bed. Updated bathroom and shower. Priced right. Friendly staff. Breakfast included. Great value and centrally close to everything. Will definitely stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Sheki09,  Thank you for your wonderful response! We are glad that you liked the place and the ambiance. Again, we are delighted to learn that the beds were comfortable and that you enjoyed the recent updates. It is true that we are considered as one of the most reasonably priced hotels in the area. We thank you on behalf of our entire team for choosing and appreciating us. We are looking forward to your next visit!  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Best kept secret for large families
Summary: We were looking for a hotel that sleeps 7 and has breakfast and found the Magnolia Tree Hotel!  Plenty of parking, about 1.5 miles from Disneyland entrance, breakfast includes cereal, bagels and juice/milk.  Room slept 7 and we really enjoyed staying there!  We will definitely come back when we are back on another Disneyland trip!
Manager Response: Dear Kepi,  Thank you for taking out the time to write to us! We are glad that you had a great experience staying here and enjoyed every bit of it, right from the parking to the breakfast. We are eagerly looking forward to your next trip!  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: As this was an impromptu trip, we were looking for a room under $100... we found Magnolia Tree in booking.com....  when I drove up, I‚Äôm not gonna lie... I got scared when I saw a retro motel from back in the day. These now a days usually mean dirty or hourly!!! BUT NOT MAGNOLIA!!! MAGNOLIA WAS AWESOME!!!... it was clean, updated, and comfortable... I also felt very safe. Parking was tight but my car was safe. I would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Lisa,  Thank you for making us glow with your review! We are glad that you found us exceeding your expectations! Thank you for appreciating us as clean, comfortable and updated. We are glad that we could make you feel safe within our premises.  We are waiting impatiently for your next visit!  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: Stayed here 2 days. Hotel was clean which is most important. Bed was  fine, free parking amd free wifi. Anout  15 min walk from Disney. Or there is a bus "43" that goes right accross disney amd back to hotel. The fare is 2 bucks per person. No change given so have 2 bucks or no change. Plenty of restaurants around. Overall all good.
Manager Response: Dear Killerbee2009,  Thank you for describing our location so well in your review! We are glad that you found the property clean and enjoyed the amenities, free parking and Wi-Fi. We are happy to have got this opportunity to host you. We don't really hesitate to ask you for many more of these opportunities! Please visit us again!  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: Our room was really big. We had two queen beds and there was still room to spare. Everything seemed very clean and new. I do wish the bathroom had counter space, because of the farmhouse style sink there was no place to put our toiletries. The beds were comfy, I just would have liked more pillows but I know I could've called and asked for some more. It was pretty noisy, we could hear the room above us and the parking lot is right outside of the rooms so it was pretty noisy at times. Continental breakfast was to be expected, and left us full. Overall we would stay again. It was only a few miles away from Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear TeamGibson09,  Thank you for your amazing response! We are glad that you found the room big and the property immaculate! Also, we have noted your suggestion regarding the counter space and will pass it to the management for future improvisations. We also regret the inconvenience caused to you as a result of the noise. However, we are glad that you liked the overall stay and enjoyed the breakfast. We hope that your next trip is just around the corner!  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: My stay there was really good. I would just say to have more of a variety on breakfast but other than that everything was perfect! I would also say the rooms are a little too small for two beds, we kept hitting our ankles on the edge of the bed.
Manager Response: Dear Giselle,  We thank you for sparing a moment to review your recent stay with us. Although we offer a lite breakfast, we have taken note of your feedback for future improvements in this area. Also, we are sorry for the inconvenience caused to you due to the less space in the room and though we have recently only renovated the property, we will continue to make further improvements. We hope you will visit us again soon!  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: Clean, convenient to Convention Center, where I was headed, with personable, and friendly help.  The rate was reasonable and worth what was charged.  If I had a negative reaction, it was regarding parking sites: a little narrow for a pickup.
Manager Response: Dear rlepcrn,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us! We are glad that you found the location convenient and service helpful. However. we are sorry about the inconvenience caused due to parking, We have noted your feedback regarding this and we will see what we can do about it. We hope to serve you again in the future!  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: The room was very nice, clean, and comfortable. The staff was very kind and the location was great! Just a short drive to the Disneyland parking structure. We would for sure stay here again on our next visit!
Manager Response: Dear Maria,  Thank you for leaving us such a lovely review. We are glad that you had a great time with us. We take immense pride in our location as it's close to Disneyland and convention center. Again, we are sure that our staff would be equally happy to read what you have written. So thank you again and we look forward to hosting you once more!  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Clean, comfortable, affordable alternative to the Mega-hotels
Summary: I was here for a conference and didn‚Äôt want to spend $250/night plus another $30 to park my car. What a ripoff!  This was a pleasant 8 minute walk to the mega-hotel hosting my conference, and parking was free!  My room was spotlessly clean, the bed was comfortable, and it was surprisingly quiet considering the hotel is on a busy street. The staff was most helpful and accommodating. If you like a huge breakfast with waffles, etc., you might be disappointed. But the bagels, toast, fruit, oatmeal, yogurt and coffee was fine by me.  There‚Äôs a refrigerator in the room but no microwave or coffee pot. However, you can always access the breakfast room for hot water for tea and to use the microwave. All in all, I was very satisfied and will definitely one again if I‚Äôm in the area.
Manager Response: Dear docmcr2019,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and reviewing that stay. We are thrilled to know that you really enjoyed your time here and found us a better option compared to the Mega-hotels. We aim to provide top-notch service to our guests at affordable rates. Your review surely affirms the hard work we put in every day. Highly elated to learn that you loved the location and found the rooms squeaky clean. If you are ever in this area, please feel free to book your stay with us. See you soon!  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: everything about room was great, good location, great price, cleanliness.  Breakfast was good, Room was cleaned everyday. Lots of restaurants, with in a block from room.  Secure parking lot, and quiet slept really well
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We are glad to hear that you had a good overall impression of your stay and we hope you were comfortable. It's nice that you liked our location and proximity to restaurants. We are also glad you found the place clean and we hope you were comfortable. Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we look forward to seeing you again soon.  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: Let me start with saying the room was decent. When we requested room service the sheets we had used weren‚Äôt changed to clean ones, they just made the bed and threw on the ones we had used. The towels they provide are old, rough and raggedy. The room has no cable, there were bugs in the restroom, and in the bathtub. The sink and shower water is dirty. We had more issues with the staff and how we were treated. As soon as we were about to check in I asked about the parking policy because my boyfriend and I drove separately to meet here. The woman working the front desk named Namrata rudely cuts me off and tells me to read the sign by the computer. The sign says one parking per guest is permitted. I said ok and if I could get the second parking pass and she says ok that it‚Äôs going
Manager Response: Hello Cristian,  We appreciate your comments - thank you for taking the time to leave us with feedback about your recent visit. It's unfortunate that you did not experience the usual level of satisfaction that other guests have but we love that you have pointed out the things that we can improve on. Your concern about cleanliness is noted and we will see to it that our team does a better job preparing the rooms. We will also see what we can do about having some updates soon. We are disappointed about the feedback on our unfriendly staff; we aim for awesome customer service and we do not tolerate rudeness from our team. We will look into the matter and have corrective measures in place. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused and we hope you consider staying with us again.   Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: This is an affordable hotel within walking distance of Disneyland and the Convention Center. There are also a lot of restaurants and shops within walking distance so there really was no need for a car.   Reception staff were friendly and the housekeeping staff did a good job. That said, the carpet in our room was filthy and had a stale odour. The AC worked well and thank goodness because we had it running pretty much 24/7.   A simple breakfast is included. Bagels, cereal and yogurt. Nothing fancy but worked fine for us.   My biggest complaint is the noise. Kids stomping around, people slamming doors, car alarms going off, etc. We were constantly woken up in the night. Next time we‚Äôll stay at a quieter hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for your review and we appreciate you giving prospective guests relevant information about our location and proximity to Disneyland and the Convention Center. It's great that our staff was able to provide you with good service and we hope you had a comfortable stay. Your feedback about the carpet/cleanliness is noted and we will see to it that our staff does a better job preparing the rooms moving forward. We will also see what we can do about having some updates to the property soon. We hope to see you again the next time you are in the area.  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Expectations were met for thos hotel!
Summary: I booked this hotel because of location and price, and I did not expect it to be a full service luxury hotel. What I got was a clean, small, convenient room at a reasonable price. I was completely satisfied with my experience, again, matching my expectations.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We are glad to hear that you had a good overall impression of your stay and we hope you were comfortable. It's nice that you found good value for the money you spent and that you were completely satisfied with your stay. Thanks for choosing to stay with us and we hope to see you again soon.  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: I would go again if i have a chance
Summary: first, I got 20% discount from their website. great price even without discount. room is very clean. breakfast is not bad. i don't think you can find a better place with this price. convenient place.  recommended!!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  It's great to hear back from you and we are glad that you found good value for the money you spent. It's nice that you found the place clean and we hope you were comfortable. Thank you for your recommendation and we hope to see you again soon.  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: I have been in magnolia hotel for one week and I had a great stay! Cleaning was very good. The bed was really confortable. Air conditioner worked fine. Breakfast was also fine and always available from 6.30 am. I would for sure  recommend it.
Manager Response: Hello Anaitasalinas,  It is a delight to hear back from you regarding your recent stay with us - it's nice that you had a good overall impression of your visit. We are glad you found the place clean and that you had a comfortable stay. We hope that everything was in order and we look forward to having you back soon.  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: Stayed here with my 2 daughters  just two weeks ago, booked a family room. It was quite a satisfying stay. There were 2 large bed and the room was big enough to accomoadate us. Room was cleaned everyday although they don't change the sheet daily :D Hotel provided breakfast, which is a very plus point because we don't have to hassle in the morning just to get something to eat.  Location is also a huge advantage. There were numerous restaurants around eg. denny's, tacobel, Jack in the box, del taco, Carl's Jr etc; Target supermarket within 10 minutes walk, a coin laundry, convenience store just right around the corner. Bus stops also within 1-5 minutes walk, going to Disneyland was such a breeze.  Hotel staffs and managers were friendly. All in all, I will recommend this hotel to
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  It is a delight to hear back from you regarding your recent stay with us - it's nice that you had a good overall impression of your visit. We are glad you found the rooms spacious and clean - we hope you had a comfortable stay. It's also nice that you liked our location and proximity to restaurants. Thanks for choosing to stay with us and we hope to see you again soon.  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: Overall we enjoyed our stay here. Check in/out staff were friendly. Room looked like they have been recently renovated. Bed was comfy. Hotel provides a nice simple continental  breakfast. Also it's about a 20 minute walk to Disneyland and within walking distance of a Target and various restaurants.  Some downsides were the bedsheets are a little rough. Even though the breakfast hit the spot it would be nice if they would provide some fresh fruit. Overall we would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We appreciate your feedback and we thank you for giving prospective guests who may be reading the comments relevant information about our location and proximity to Disneyland. It's nice to hear that our staff was able to provide you with good service during your stay. Your feedback about breakfast is duly noted and we will consider adding some more options in the future. Thanks for choosing to stay with us and we hope to see you again soon.  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: The staff was friendly.  Room was clean, fresh and nicely furnished. Accommodated our large family comfortably. We Will stay again when visiting California. We didn‚Äôt realize check it was at 11:00 and front desk called to remind us and they were very nice about it
Manager Response: Hi Sheyeurs,  Our hearts are filled with joy because of the wonderful feedback that you provided. It's nice that you found the rooms clean and we hope you and your family had a comfortable stay. Our staff also thanks you for the nice commendation you left about the service. Thanks for choosing to stay with us and we look forward to your next visit.  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: The room was great! Very nice layout, easy to get to. Included breakfast. Great WiFi. Very friendly staff. Very affordable. Big bathroom! Perfect for the short stay we came for! Convenient for the convention center. Easy walking distance.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We appreciate your feedback and we thank you for giving prospective guests who may be reading the comments relevant information about our location and proximity to the convention center. We are glad you liked the room and found the prices to be affordable. Our staff also thanks you for the nice comment you left about the service. Thanks for choosing to stay with us and we hope to see you again soon.  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: Very clean and safe and accessible. Close enough to Disney to walk for all but the smallest children. The beds were comfortable and the a/c was good.   For the money this was a five star hotel.   It has a big walk in closet - shockingly big.   Downsides are no real counter space at all in the bathroom and the breakfast is cereal heavy. But for the money this was an excellent choice for us.
Manager Response: Hi Matthew,  We appreciate your feedback and we thank you for giving prospective guests who may be reading the comments relevant information about our location and proximity to Disney. We are glad you found the place clean and safe - we hope you had a comfortable stay. We will see what we can do about having some additional updates soon. We are glad you found good value for the money you spent and we look forward to your next visit.  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: Stayed here for 2 weekday nights with my son. While the website and many pictures online were hopeful, the experience left me a little exasperated.   It‚Äôs a motel style accommodation with very  and limited parking. SUVs and trucks be warned; do NOT park towards the rear because there is a perpendicular parking row that will likely trap you in your spot. Location is great though if you‚Äôre going to the park or the convention center. There‚Äôs plenty of restaurants and a Target a half block down.   Check in was very pleasant with a bubbly receptionist. Check out, I had to look around and call the desk while standing there waiting for someone to show up. It wasn‚Äôt too long but long enough that I walked around the property looking for help.   The rooms were updated but there was what
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for your review and we appreciate you giving prospective guests relevant information about our location and proximity to the convention center/restaurants. Your comment about maintenance is noted and we will see to it that our team does a better job preparing the area moving forward. We will also see what we can do about having some updates soon. Your feedback about breakfast is also duly noted and we will consider adding some more options in the future. We hope you consider staying with us again soon.  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: A good 2 night stay for a good price, close to Disneyland
Summary: Stayed 2 nights in the middle of June. They were running a great promotion.  I already knew from reviews, that this was a good choice. Front desk staff was friendly. Room was nice, clean, and everything working. I was surprised they still have carpet. It was the type that turns your feet black. Too hard to keep clean. The bathroom ceiling was really low. It took some getting used to. Bed was nice and comfortable, sleep great. Some other guest noise, but not the hotel's fault. Parking was a bit more tight then I am used to. Could be an issue. But parking is still free, included in the price. Over all a nice stay.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  It is great to hear feedback from you regarding your recent stay with us - we are glad to hear that you had a good overall impression of your stay. It's good to hear that you were able to avail of a good promotion and that you found the place generally clean. We are also glad to hear that our staff was able to provide you with good service. Your feedback about the carpet is noted and we will see what we can do about it We will also see what we can do about having an update soon. We hope to see you again the next time you are in the area.  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Don't Judge A Book By Its Cover
Summary: Upon arriving at the hotel, we were highly skeptical about our booking decision. The exterior of the small grey building was underwhelming and in need of fresh paint or a face lift to reflect its name, Magnolia Tree.  When we arrived at our room, we were pleasantly surprised to find the interior was newly renovated and clean.  The sleeping area, although small, included a new king size bed and mattress, new side tables, carpeting, and paint. It also included a small refrigerator and widescreen television. The room had a walk-in closet to accommodate our bags.  The bathroom donned all new cabinetry, sinks, shower/tub, and tile floor.  The hotel breakfast was very limited, and the breakfast area could use improvements.  In comparison to other hotels in the area it was a value if
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We love hearing back from you about your recent stay with us. We always look forward to feedback about how we can make things better for our guests and how we can improve. We are glad to hear that we were able to surprise you with the quality of our rooms - we hope you had a comfortable stay. Your feedback about the exterior is noted and we will see what we can do about having additional updates to the property. Your feedback about breakfast is also duly noted and we will consider adding some more options in the future. We hope to see you again soon.  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Worst hotel and Service I've ever seen!
Summary: We booked this hotel on Hoteltonight. The price fit our budget and we have been trying different hotels in the Anaheim area. When we checked in we were charged a very large for the price of the room deposit. The room was $90 the deposit was $100.My boyfriend is a smoker and the staff let us know where the designated smoking section is (bottom of the stairs under some rooms in the corner, not bad). When we got in the room we were smacked in the face by an overpowering bleach smell that gave me a headache and turned my stomach. This place is trying very hard to appear clean. We took off our shoes and from walk the bed to the bathroom my feet were turned black, the carpets were greasy and sticky. So gross. We brought the concernes about the smell and carpet to the attention of
Manager Response: Dear guest, We want all our guests to have a great stay with us and the vast majority of all our guests do have a wonderful stay with us. We are always disappointed when a guest leaves with less than the first-rate experience. As you know the parking is very tough in the area, but we do provide a convenient option for our guests. However, options being limited, we want to make sure everyone is able to park well, that is the reason we left a kind note requesting if you could re-park just so we can accommodate fellow guests. Our housekeeping usually does a great job preparing the room for all upcoming guests and stocks the room with all items, including towels which are kept in the drawer. If there is anything you need, just give us a call, we'd be happy to bring it right over. Our housekeeping staff generally checks on every room to ensure our guests receive the room service, we are sorry if our housekeeping team was not aware that you were checking out the same day. Our entire team does work hard to provide a pleasant and comfortable stay for all our guests, so we are very sorry to see that we did not achieve that goal on your visit. This is very unusual and rare. We sincerely hope that you will give us another chance to restore your faith in our hotel and hospitality. Thanks again.    Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: For the price the hotel is good. It has more of a motel/inn feeling but overall good. Breakfast is only a few items: bagels, toast, cereal, yogurt, oatmeal. The room is very nice however it gets very humid and makes the bed sheets damp and my clothes smell. Other than that the hotel is good.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  It's nice to hear back from you - we are glad that you found our rates to be reasonable and competitive. We are glad you had a good overall impression of your stay. Your feedback about the humidity is noted and we will see what we can do about it. Your feedback about breakfast is duly noted and we will consider adding some more options in the future. We hope to see you again the next time you are in the area.  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: The rooms were well kept and clean, bed was comfortable. Motel-style with doors open to the car park on ground level or upper balcony/walkway. As a seasoned traveller this didn't bother me too much but others, especially single travellers, may not like this.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  It is great to hear feedback from you regarding your recent stay with us. We are glad you found the rooms clean and that you had a comfortable stay. We also thank you for the tips you left about our location and appearance. We hope to see you again the next time you are in the area.  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: The room was very clean. The bedding and the tub were very clean which made out stay very pleasant. The room was pretty small but I will take small and clean over big and dirty any day. The gentleman that checked us in was very nice and informative.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  It is great to hear feedback from you regarding your recent stay with us - we are glad to hear that you had a good overall impression of your stay. it's nice to hear that you found the rooms clean and we hope you had a comfortable stay. We are also happy to hear that our staff was able to take good care of your needs during your stay. We look forward to having you back soon.  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Great location, comfy bed and plenty of hot water!!
Summary: Stayed 4 nights recently and was really pleased by the friendly staff, the super comfy bed and the smokin' hot water - when you need a bath at the end of the day, that hot water is sooo welcome!! Is a budget hotel, but I would stay there again in a heartbeat. The location is close to Target, restaurants and an easy Disney shuttle. Great little gem in Anaheim for a good nights sleep. Was nice to have a fridge and a basic breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We appreciate your feedback and we thank you for giving prospective guests who may be reading the comments relevant information about our location and proximity to Disney/Target/local restaurants. We are glad you had a comfortable stay and that our staff was able to provide you with awesome service. It's nice that you found good value for the money you spent and we look forward to your next visit.  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: I'd give it 3.5 if I could
Summary: We stayed in a family room with bunk beds. On the surface, it was a great room. They have tapped into the fresh, modern vibe for bedding which was great to see. Forest green and red are tired! Considering it was spring break, the price was amazing. We were on the bottom floor, but always able to park in front of our room every time. We bring white noise machines but could hear the people above us all night long, so I'd request a second-floor room. Personally, we don't think it's close enough to Disney to walk. Not a knock on the hotel, but I'd drive to the park or the bus lot (Woody & Friends, I think) closer to the hotel. We chose to drive to the park. Definitely needs some additional work, though. We're at Disneyland - the average family has at least 3 kids so two towel bars
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  It's nice to hear back from you - we are glad that you found our rates to be reasonable and competitive. It's good to hear you liked the overall look of the hotel as well as the bedding style. Your comment about cleanliness is noted and we will see to it that our staff does a better job preparing the rooms moving forward. We will also see what we can do about having some updates to the property soon. Your feedback about breakfast is duly noted and we will consider adding some more options in the future. We will also see what we can do about providing more channel options in the future. We hope you consider staying with us again in the near future.  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: Nice! Clean & quiet! Price was fair for the location & condition. Breakfast was good, better than basic continental. The gentleman gave us an early checking & a free upgrade from a Queen room to King!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  It's great to hear back from you and we are glad that you found good value for the money you spent. It's great that you found our place to be clean and we hope you had a comfortable stay. We are also happy to hear that you were quite satisfied with the service that you received. Thanks for choosing to stay with us and we hope to see you again soon.  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: It's  a bit far to walk to Disney, but we did Lyft which was good. They have complimentary bagels, toast, cereal, juice, and coffee for breakfast which was nice. Parking was minimal since the lot was not very big. Overall nice stay.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  It is great to hear feedback from you regarding your recent stay with us - we are glad to hear that you had a good overall impression of your stay. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your breakfast and we hope that you had a great time at Disney. We hope that you had a comfortable stay and that everything was in order. Thanks for choosing to stay with us and we hope to see you again soon.  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: The best of this hotel is its location and service. We walk to the Convention Center, Disneyland and many shops and restaurants are nearby. It is also close to The Outlets at Orange. The staff were always helpful and let me receive an Amazon shipping. Breakfast is not spectacular but enough. The room was clean. I would absolutely recommend it for couples.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for your review and we appreciate you giving prospective guests relevant information about our location and proximity to Disneyland / Convention Center. We are also glad you found shops and restaurants easily accessible. Our staff thanks you for the nice commendation you left about the service you received. Thanks for your recommendation and we look forward to your next visit.  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: Everything was excellent, rooms clean, beds comfortable, customer service and breakfast. It was a 15 minute walk to the convention center and convenient to bus transportation. Lots of fast food and restaurants within walking distance.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for your review and we appreciate you giving prospective guests relevant information about our location and proximity to the convention center. We are glad you found the rooms clean and the beds comfy. We hope you had a great time and we look forward to your next visit.  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: This could be a great little place with a little tweaking but the management has no clue what travelers really want.  As much as I like the "Pros", the "Cons" are too numerous to give the Magnolia Tree more than 3 stars. Anaheim offers too much hotel competition in this price range for me to choose to stay here again.  Pros:  Clean & spacious rooms Very Nice Furniture A/C &heat Mini Fridge Free WiFi (if it doesn't kick you off the network) Downtown & close to Everything, (restaurants, pubs, Disney, Convention Center  Quiet Large Screen TV Free Parking *  Cons:   No Lamps on desk or nightstand -have to get out of bed to turn off lights via wall switches-not good for reading in bed  No Charging Station in room No Microwave Not enough & inaccessible outlets-had to move the desk to
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for your review and we appreciate you giving prospective guests relevant information about our location and proximity to the downtown area. It's nice to hear that you found the rooms spacious and that you found the place to be clean. Your feedback about the additional amenities is noted and we will see what we can do about having some updates soon. We are also sorry to hear that your requested room was released to somebody else - we will look into our processes and see how we can avoid similar concerns in the future. Thanks for choosing to stay with us and we hope you consider staying with us again.  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: The Magnolia is .7 miles (15 minute walk) from the Anaheim Convention Center.  I didn't have car but they have free parking.  I arrived in the morning and the hotel staff stored my luggage while I went to the convention center for the day.  I checked in late afternoon and retrieved my luggage.  Again when I checked out they stored my luggage for the day while I was away.  This was a big convenience for me.  The hotel is old but the bathroom was nicely updated.  A power box on the nightstand had multiple USB outlets for charging devices - very convenient.  The sink was stylish but not so practical - it was all basin with only a narrow lip around it so there was no place to put my toiletries.  A large decent quality flat screen tv with a lot of broadcast channels, with multiple
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for your detailed and complimentary feedback; we very much appreciate the time that you spent sharing your experience with us. It is always wonderful to hear positive feedback in relation to our staff, thank you for those comments. We are pleased that the cleanliness of your room was satisfactory and that you had a comfortable stay. It sounds as if our hotel was very suitable for your accommodation needs in terms of the facilities that we offer. We hope to remain your hotel of choice in the Anaheim area.   Best Regards, Magnolia Tree Hotel  Customer Experience Team

Summary: This hotel was much better than we expected! The rooms were VERY clean and updated ... just like the photos! It is close to all of the attractions, restaurants, shopping... Overall it is a good value hotel for the price.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  It is wonderful hearing back from our satisfied guests and we are glad to hear that you had an awesome stay with us. We are glad that we were able to exceed your expectations and that you liked the room and the hotel. We hope you were comfortable and had easy access to everything you needed. It's also great that you liked our location and proximity to local establishments. We are glad you found good value for the money you spent and we look forward to seeing you again soon.  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: VERY clean. Friendly staff. Fast a d easy check in process. Please consider disposable cups in the room for tooth brushing/rinsing purposes. Other than that, it's perfect for the price! Thank you very much.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Our hearts are filled with joy because of the wonderful feedback that you provided. We are glad to hear that you had an awesome weekend getaway and that you found everything to be clean. Our staff will be delighted to hear that you left a nice commendation about the service you received. Your feedback about disposable cups is noted and we will see what we can do about it. Thanks for choosing to stay with us and we look forward to your next visit.  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: We have stayed here twice and both times were excellent.  Clean, quiet rooms, parking has been fine. Helpful, speedy front desk. Accommodated our needs and took care of a slight misunderstanding with no extra charges. Will stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are beaming with pride because of your amazing feedback. It's always great to hear back from returning guests and we are happy that we have consistently provided you with great service. We are glad you liked the clean rooms and it's nice to hear that you only have good words for our staff. Thanks for choosing to stay with us and we look forward to having you back soon.  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: We arrived to find our booking was cancelled and they'd sold our room to another party
Summary: We booked a family room.  We arrived at 8pm after a bus trip from Las Vegas to find no one in the office, no answer to the phone. We waited 20 minutes for someone to return to the office, only for them to tell us that they had cancelled our booking. I pulled out the printed confirmation email I received and the desk clerk said they'd tried calling me to confirm several times that day (I had no missed calls or voice mails) and because they couldn't reach me, they sold the room to another party. How is a guest supposed to answer or return a call if they are on a plane or on a bus through intermittent phone service?  They also claimed they couldn't process my payment, however it was booked as "pay on stay" so I was not due to pay until we arrived - however for some reason the card
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We appreciate your feedback - thank you for taking the time to leave us with comments about your recent stay. It's unfortunate that you did not seem to have experienced the usual level of satisfaction that other guests have but thanks for pointing out the things that we can improve on. We do apologize for what transpired during your trip - we have certain policies in place regarding late check-ins and "unconfirmed" bookings but it does sound like you had a valid "pay on stay" reservation. It would have been great had we heard earlier from you but we do understand that a phone call may not have been possible during transit. We will look further into the issue and see how we can improve on our end moving forward. This situation does not typically happen and we are truly sorry that you were inconvenienced. We are glad that you found a nice alternative nearby. Once again, we apologize and we hope you consider booking with us again in the future.  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: This is the third time that I have stayed at this hotel and I have been pleased everytime that I have been. Me and my wife went for 3 nights and we enjoyed our stay. The only downside was that our TV didn‚Äôt work and couldn‚Äôt be fixed. But overall I will continue to stay there.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  It is great to hear feedback from you regarding your recent stay with us - we are always happy hearing back from returning guests. It's nice that you are consistently pleased with your stays and we hope for your continued patronage. We are very happy that you and your wife had a great time and we hope you had access to everything that you needed. We do apologize for the issue with the TV set - we will have someone look into this and have it repaired/replaced. Thanks for choosing to stay with us and we would love to see you again soon.  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: We had the king room. Very small,basic. No room to really move around. That was fine with us. Very clean and bed was comfortable. Rooms can be noisy when everyone was coming back from Disneyland. If your looking for a clean, simple room to sleep and shower so you can spend more money in the park this is it. I was very happy with our selection. No counter room in the bathroom. Toy Story parking about two blocks. They do have a complimentary breakfast, but we did not use.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  It is wonderful hearing back from our satisfied guests and we are glad to hear that you had an awesome stay with us. We are glad that you found the room to be clean and comfortable and we hope you had a good time at Disney. It's great that you found good value for the money you spent and had an additional budget for your Disney trip. Thanks for choosing to stay with us and we hope to see you again soon.  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Cheap and good location for those visiting Disneyland.
Summary: A close location and cheaper alternative for those visiting Disneyland. Try to get an upstairs room though if you can, the noise from upstairs carried really badly to the downstairs room and kept us awake at night.
Manager Response: Hello Chloe,  It is great to hear feedback from you regarding your recent stay with us. We are happy to hear that our location and proximity to Disneyland made things more comfortable for you. Thanks for suggesting that you found good value for the price that you paid. We are sorry for the disturbance caused by the other guests - as you can imagine, this can sometimes be out of our control. We will try to assign a quieter room for you the next time you stay with us. We hope to see you again soon.  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: The hotel staff was nice and courteous! The room we were in was small and definitely looked bigger in the pictures than in person. But it wasn't bad... the only thing that bothered me was the walls in the bathroom were dirty. Otherwise we had a good stay.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay with us. It's good to hear that you found our staff nice and courteous - they will be happy to hear about your positive comment! We are happy that you had a good stay. Your concern about the bathroom walls is duly noted - we will take immediate action to ensure that this is improved soon. Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we look forward to seeing you again soon.  Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Clean  hotel walking distance to Disneyland
Summary: Customer service was good based on our experience,Joy was awesome( Filipina at the desk)..The breakfast is basic coffee,tea,toast n cereal..The carpet is dirty,I came out of the shower and stepped on it my feet was all black after.It is disgusting,they need to shampoo the carpet give it a good clean.
Manager Response: Hi Mary, Thank you for providing your feedback on your recent stay at our hotel; we are much appreciative. We are known for our wonderful team, and we are pleased that you received the friendly service that our guests have come to expect from us. We are in the process of arranging for some of our carpets to be deep-cleaned, as some of them are getting a little tired looking.  We hope that you will notice an improvement when you next stay with us.   Best Regards,  Magnolia Tree Hotel Customer Care Team

Summary: Cheap Hotel and cheap service. Jasmine needs to learn customer service before she works in the front desk. Starting from the customer we should have known room should be terrible . They are beds are comfy but floor is filthy as hell.
Manager Response: Dear guest, we appreciate your feedback and thank you for complimenting us on our comfortable beds. We apologize profusely for the problems you experienced with our staff member. This is most unusual as we are renowned for our friendly and helpful staff. Nonetheless, we will ensure that your feedback is discussed with the entire team and we will take steps to ensure that this incident does not happen again. We deeply value the importance of good customer service and rest assured that we take all comments from our guests seriously. Your comments on cleanliness are also duly noted. We appreciate your patience and hope you will stay with us again for a more gratifying experience  Kind regards, Customer Care Team Magnolia Tree Hotel

Summary: Stayed here for two nights to visit Disneyland. Room was big and tidy with everything you would expect. We had a minor issue with shower which was seen to straight away. Staff friendly and helpful. Hotel is a 5 Minute taxi or 20 minutes walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hi Tony, we are always pleased to receive feedback from our guests in relation to their stays with us, and we are delighted with your rating, thank you very much. We are happy to have satisfied you so well, and we hope to remain your hotel of choice here for future visits.  Warm regards, Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Good for the night, not for extended stays
Summary: The beds were nice and comfortable. We slept very well. Staff was helpful and friendly. The property is clean.   Parking is limited and not set for any large vehicles.   Breakfast is limited. Bagels with cream cheese. Toast with butter as jam. Cereal with low fat or soy milk. Yogurt. Instant oatmeal. That‚Äôs all. Dining room is clean and has a microwave for you to heat leftovers.   The hotel room itself could use some improvements. In the bathroom there is no where to place towels before use or after, there is no counter space for makeup or hairdryer or straightener, and clean clothes. There is not mirror outside the bathroom so multiple people can get ready at the same time. The floor in room 217 by the window is rotted and is a safety/health hazard.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, we are always looking into ways to better serve our guests and your suggestions are very helpful.

Summary Heading: not the most comfortable hotel room.
Summary: We stayed 5 days, my self, grandma 76 and two 18yr old girls.   They took $100 from my account a week before we even arrived. Then took pmt for our stay the day before we even got there. I find this very strange. Made me instantly be uncomfortable.   The room was lacking in amenities, no where to set anything other then a desk and side table. No table/chairs/dresser only one desk chair, bed was pretty high off the ground making it difficult for grandma to sit anywhere. There were no drinking cups in the room, no counter space in bathroom, a very large sink but no where to set your things. The shower had glass doors not a curtain. It made it very difficult for my grandma to get into the very slippery shower. There were no safety handles anywhere with in the shower stahl... just a
Manager Response: We're sorry you had issues with your room, we will respond to any problems guests may have when we are told about them.

Summary: I was so skeptical reading some of the reviews, but we had the family suite and it was clean, so comfy, new and nice. The bed was amazingly comfy!!! Two TVs, fridge and microwave, large closet, charging station, plenty of towels, The bathroom needs more counter space and the shower is nice, new tile but no soap dish or spot to put anything. This hotel was a little further away from DL than I thought but still walkable and right next to the toy story parking lot which has a shuttle. Breakfast was good, bagels, breads, yogurt, cold and hot cereal, juice and great coffee. Would totally stay there again. As for front desk rudeness like the other reviews, I didn‚Äôt really think she was rude but we didn‚Äôt have problems that had to be handled either. I did notice a lack of personality,
Manager Response: Thank you for your honest review. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay at our property. We hope to see you soon on your next trip to the Disney area.

Summary: Poor customer service. Rude front desk. Save yourself trouble and spend a little bit more money elsewhere, it will be worth it!!  My MIL booked a room for us and for them. A few days before arriving, I realized they would be arriving hours after us, so I called to verify check in procedures so that we would be allowed to check in and not have to wait 8 hours for them to arrive after we got there. I was assured over the phone that if I had the credit card the stay was booked with plus the cc owners ID, they would allow us to check in. The person on the phone even said she would put a note on our account explaining the situation. Fast forward to arrival 10/6/17; I took the cc and matching ID to the front desk, and the front desk person wouldn't even listen to me explain the
Manager Response: I'm sorry to hear you had a bad experience at your hotel. We are doing our best to reflect on situations like this to better our customer service experience. I hope you reconsider and stay with us at a future date.

Summary: I don't usually write bad reviews but I just have to let people know what goes on at this motel. First off you should believe the other reviews you will read about the rooms being very small, the bathrooms being awkward with no where to set your belongings, the floor was for some reason horribly filthy (I noticed my sister's feet and mine were black like charcoal and we hadn't done anything that day except walk down the sidewalk and in the convention center). I also left 4 of my gold rings on the bed side table (I know that was my second mistake, the first one was booking the motel in the first place) and my sister and I had to go to the convention center for the day, when we got back i noticed two of my rings were missing. I called to the office to see if maybe by chance the
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a hotel fairly close to the Hyatt, Hampton Inn and Embassy Suites. The outside looks suspicious but the inside rooms were remodeled and quaint.  The breakfast is just cereal, juice and toast.  No meat, eggs or yogurt or fruit.  The room had a king size sleigh bed and bunk beds for the kids.  The parking lot is full and inadequate for the number of guests.  I was told to park in an empty complex next door which was not reassuring.
Manager Response: Thank you for your honest review. At the time of your stay we were a fairly new establishment. Since then we have made improvements to our property. I hope you will come visit us again during your next stay in Anaheim!
